Question: Korea ITS co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gaudio Lab

Product: Just Voice

 - AI-based real-time noise removal solution
 - Won CES 2024 Innovation Award in Web2 and Metaverse categories
 - Recognized for outstanding innovation, second consecutive year

Koreasoft Co.,Ltd

Product: Bugs Farm

 - Smart farm factory solution
 - Advanced environmental control
 - Utilizes robots and AI technology for insect breeding
 - Produces safe, edible insects for sustainable and healthy food options
Summary_cn:
高迪奥实验室

产品：Just Voice

- 基于人工智能的实时噪音去除解决方案
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖Web2和Metaverse类别
- 因卓越创新而获得认可，连续两年

韩国软件有限公司

产品：Bugs Farm

- 智能农场工厂解决方案
- 先进的环境控制
- 利用机器人和人工智能技术进行昆虫饲养
- 生产安全、可食用的昆虫，为可持续和健康的食品选择提供支持
